name: AsyncUDP_STM32
description: Fully Asynchronous UDP Library for STM32 using LAN8720 or built-in LAN8742A Ethernet. The library is easy to use and includes support for Unicast, Broadcast and Multicast environments.
keywords: communication, data, async, udp, ntp, time, time-server, server, client, multicast, broadcast, webserver, stm32, stm32f, stm32l, stm32h, stm32g, stm32wb, stm32mp1, ST STM32, bluepill, blackpill, ethernet, lan8742a, lan8720, stm32f7, stm32f4, f407ve, nucleo, nucleo-144
